<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This will call writeResolver on the given EPCIndirectionUtils instance</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="comment">/// to set up re-entry via a function that will directly return the trampoline</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="comment">/// landing address.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The EPCIndirectionUtils&#39; LazyCallThroughManager must have been previously</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="comment">/// created via EPCIndirectionUtils::createLazyCallThroughManager.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The EPCIndirectionUtils&#39; writeResolver method must not have been previously</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="comment">/// called.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This function is experimental and likely subject to revision.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343a902b0d55fddef6f8d651fe1035b7d4bd">Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/orc/#ad5f773f31c1e2529e6dca4686a3b968e">setUpInProcessLCTMReentryViaEPCIU</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/epcindirectionutils">EPCIndirectionUtils</a> &amp;EPCIU);</Highlight></CodeLine>
